verbs.description: White House aides [V: have] emphasized that Trump 's aim is to keep the door open to working with rival leaders on shared challenges despite their differences .
[ARG0: White House aides] have [V: emphasized] [ARG1: that Trump 's aim is to keep the door open to working with rival leaders on shared challenges despite their differences] .
White House aides have emphasized that [ARG1: Trump 's aim] [V: is] [ARG2: to keep the door open to working with rival leaders on shared challenges despite their differences] .
White House aides have emphasized that Trump 's aim is to [V: keep] [ARG1: the door] [ARG2: open to working with rival leaders on shared challenges despite their differences] .
White House aides have emphasized that Trump 's aim is to keep the door open to [V: working] [ARG3: with rival leaders] [ARG1: on shared challenges] [ARGM-ADV: despite their differences] .
White House aides have emphasized that Trump 's aim is to keep the door open to working with rival leaders on [V: shared] [ARG1: challenges] despite their differences .
